questions.question: Which phrase would you most likely say?

choices.choice: If my friends jump off a cliff, why wouldn't I jump off with them? Duh.
I secretly look down on all of you
I play songs that make my car shake.

questions.question: Which best describes your friday night?

choices.choice: Waiting for that beat to drop
Riding a horse off into the sunset
Hanging out with someone named Becky

questions.question: When you tell people about your favorite artist, people usually reply with something like...

choices.choice: 'WHAT DID YOU SAY?! I can't hear you over this music!'
'Oh, I only know the dude that's blind.'

questions.question: Complete this sentence: 'My funeral music better be...'

choices.choice: Loud enough to get a noise complaint
